00013 if (empty($_GET['term'])) exit ;
00014 $q = strtolower($_GET["term"]);
00015 // remove slashes if they were magically added
00016 if (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) $q = stripslashes($q);
00017 
00018 include_once ('../lib/php/orm/DbConnector.php');
00019 
00020 //CREATE DATABASE CONNECTION
00021 $link = new DbConnector('');
00022 
00023 $query = "SELECT DISTINCT instrument_name AS name FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%$q%';";
00024 $result = $link->query($query);
00025 if ($link->getNumRows($result) > 0)
00026 {
00027         $return = array();
00028         while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00029         {
00030                 array_push($return, array("id"=>$row['name'], "label"=>$row['name'],
00031                          "value" => strip_tags($row['name'])));
00032         }
00033 }
00034 else
00035 {
00036         $return = false;
00037 }
00038 mysqli_free_result($result);
00039 
00040 $link->close();
00041 
00042 // json_encode is available in PHP 5.2 and above, or you can install a PECL module in earlier versions
00043 echo json_encode($return);
00044 
00045 ?>
